## Problem 1

Load the penguins dataset
```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```

Inspect the dataset
```{r}
ncol(penguins)
nrow(penguins)
summary(penguins)
```

The 'penguins' is a dataset from the 'palmerpenguins' package. It includes `r nrow(penguins)` observations and `r ncol(penguins)` variables. 

The variables 
The data encompasses several measurements from three different species of penguins (Adelie, Chinstrap, and Gentoo).
